CustomField.description: Field alerts to display to user
CustomField.formula:
/*IF(NOT(ISBLANK(fpro__NamespacePrefix__c)), "MANAGED: This is a managed field, and cannot be controlled." & BR() & BR() & "", "") + IF(fpro__References_Profile_Visibility_Count__c = 0, "DEPRECATE: This field is not visible to any profile." & BR() & BR() & "", "") + IF(fpro__Is_Deleted__c, "DELETED: This field has been deleted from the org." & BR() & BR() & "", "") + IF(ISBLANK(fpro__Description__c), "MISSING: Description is missing." & BR() & BR() & "", "") + IF(ISBLANK(fpro__Inline_Help_Text__c), "MISSING: Inline Help Text is missing." & BR() & BR() & "", "") + IF(ISBLANK(fpro__Compliance_Categorization__c), "MISSING: Compliance Categorization is missing." & BR() & BR() & "", "") + IF(ISBLANK(fpro__Data_Owner__c), "MISSING: Data Owner is missing.", "")*/
"DEPRECATED"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field alerts to display to user
CustomField.label: (Deleted) Alerts
